The image shows two side: by-side photos, one of Dhammika Bandara, an ayurvedic practitioner in Sri Lanka who falsely claimed to have a cure for Covid-19 using honey, and the other of a man receiving an injection.
The Sinhala: language text superimposed on the image indicates that the person receiving the vaccine is Dhammika.
